text:
*目前我們僅接受台灣地區境內設立之銀行台幣轉帳或臨櫃台幣匯款。
帳戶名稱：荷蘭商聯想股份有限公司台灣分公司
銀行名稱：花旗台灣商業銀行 (021)
銀行分支機構：營業部 (0018)
銀行地址：台北市信義區松智路1號12-16樓
轉入帳戶：72720 +訂單編號數字部分9碼 (共14碼)
例如：
您的訂單編號為[redacted_number]
您進行匯款的帳號則為 [redacted_number]
trans:
*Currently, we only accept bank transfers in NTD from banks established within Taiwan or over-the-counter remittances in NTD.
Account Name: Lenovo Technology B.V. Taiwan Branch
Bank Name: Citibank Taiwan (021)
Bank branch: Sales Department (0018)
Bank address: 12th-16th Floors, No. 1, Songzhi Road, Xinyi District, Taipei City
Transfer to account: 72720 + 9 digits of the numerical part of the order number (14 digits in total)
For example:
Your order number is [redacted_number]
The account number you are transferring funds to is [redacted_number]
